name: JORBY
description:
Cannibalize your past self in this intense, permadeath action platformer. You control Jorby, an adorable frog beast with projectile spit. Your goal is simply to travel as deep as possible into the procedurally generated wilderness. Once you die, your body remains on that level, allowing you to heal by eating your corpse next time you come by!

Made in 48 hours in spring 2016
